At the time of digital age, Live Music is one of the last tribal experiences,
which connects people in unique manners, to live their passions, express their personalities
and ultimately bring more happiness and understanding to the world.

 
 
 

How We Help

Fans

 
 
 
 

NEVER MISS ANOTHER LIVE SHOW.
Bandsintown Concerts provides a personalized way for music fans to track their favorite artists so they never miss a live show and to discover new touring artists, based on their music preferences and location.

 
 
#1

Concert Discovery App in the World

#1

On iOS, Android and Facebook

Largest Event Creator on Facebook
 

How We Help

ARTISTS

 
 
 
 

￼￼￼￼￼￼￼THE INDUSTRY STANDARD FOR ONLINE TOUR PROMOTION AND SOCIAL MEDIA MARKETING.
Bandsintown Manager, the #1 tour promotion app in the world, gives artists an incredible platform to connect with their fans. Promote tour dates, communicate directly with fans, and increase fan social engagement.

 
65%+

Usage By U.S. Touring Artists

 
 
 

FACEBOOK / MOBILE APP
Syncs tour data to Bandsintown.com, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Google Search, Tumblr, WordPress, Squarespace, Beatport and more!

 
 

How We Help

Brands

 

Artist Alignment

Experiences

Amplification

 
 
 
 

WELCOME TO THE EASIEST AND MOST DIRECT WAY TO CONNECT WITH MUSIC ARTISTS AND THEIR FANS
Bandsintown Amplified is a multi-screen advertising platform that connects brands with a passionate community of fans and artists through an exclusive network of 50+ publishers.

 
 

MONTHLY FAN REACH
(GLOBAL)

 

MUSIC INSIGHTS
(PREDICT CONSUMER-PURCHASING BEHAVIOR BASED ON MUSIC TASTE)

 
 
 
 

How Fans Engage With Live Music

How We Help

Promoters

 
 
 
 

PROMOTE YOUR EVENT TO CONCERT-GOERS.
Bandsintown Promoter allows event promoters to assess local fan demand for specific artists and
leverage our innovative ad solutions to reach concert-goers who are interested in your lineup.

 
#1

Community of Concert-Goers In The World

TARGETING
Advanced targeting by affinity, behavior and location.

CONCERT-GOERS
Ideal for festival and tour line ups, pre-sale and on sale announcements, VIP experiences.

ANALYTICS-BASED
Industry-leading presale / onsale email campaigns open rates and click through rates.
